page.title: 03Education Atlantic College
page.content: Atlantic College is situated in an attractive position by the sea.There are six boarding houses each accommodating 48 students.There are another two houses which have 30 students in each.Altogether there are well over 300 students.It is compulsory for these students to study six subjects.A language which they are best at and a modern foreign language: English,French,German,Spanish and Italian.At present Russian and Chinese are also offered.The study of man: History,Economics,Geography and Politics.The Experimental Sciences: Physics,Chemistry,Physical Sciences, Biology,Environmental Studies and Electronic Systems.Mathematics and Art,Music or further Mathematics.The students have to study far more subjects than a pupil doing A level at a Comprehensive School.
